flawed_nl_solution:
For the night he was able to intake 110 + 310 + 215 = <<110+310+215=635>>635 calories
For breakfast and lunch, he was able to intake 560 + 780 = <<560+780=1430>>1430 calories
So, for the entire day Voldemort was able to intake 1430 + 635 = <<1430+635=2065>>2065 calories
Therefore, he can still intake 2500 - 2065 = <<435=435>>435 calories.
#### 435

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1340, not 1430. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
